```py
>>> import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
>>> fig, ax = plt.subplots()
>>> x = np.linspace(0., 5., 1000)
>>> int_i, int_k = it2i0k0(x)
>>> ax.plot(x, int_i, label=r"$\int_0^x \frac{I_0(t)-1}{t}\,dt$")
>>> ax.plot(x, int_k, label=r"$\int_x^{\infty} \frac{K_0(t)}{t}\,dt$")
>>> ax.legend()
>>> ax.set_ylim(0, 10)
>>> plt.show() 
```
